app.title: City of Curitiba — Indicators Dashboard
app.subtitle: Version with i18n (i18next) and remote templates
app.footer: Base prepared for i18n (i18next) and versioned external templates.

avg_by_sector.title: Average satisfaction by sector
avg_by_sector.infoCopy: Each bar represents the 1–5 average score per sector. 1–2 = poor; 3–4 = neutral; 5 = excellent.

distribution.title: Score distribution
distribution.infoCopy: Share of good/neutral/poor ratings per sector after filters are applied.

trend_sector.title: Monthly trend by sector
trend_sector.infoCopy: Monthly averages per sector considering active surveys only.

reviews_month.title: Reviews per month
reviews_month.infoCopy: Responses collected per month after filters (sector/gender/age range/period).

map_neighborhoods.title: City map — responses by neighborhood
map_neighborhoods.infoCopy: Spatial distribution based on the geohashes/neighborhoods reported in surveys.

share_sector.title: Sector share
share_sector.infoCopy: Share of each sector inside the active survey set.

info.hint: Tap the icon again to close.

sync.title: Multi-device
sync.lead: Enable Google Drive sync so your surveys and preferences are available on all your devices. You'll see a Google permission prompt.
sync.ctaHint: Stores settings and survey catalogs in your Drive, with consent.
